summary:
Eager, data-driven and ambitious marketeer with a demonstrated record of working in the creative and digital industries. Focused on social media marketing, social advertising, Google Ads, media buying, digital strategy, social campaign production, online brand activations, and community-building. 

I worked in the spectrum of both client and agency-side for a wide palette of regional and global brands like Toyota, Uber, Volkswagen, Philips, IKEA, OneFootball, Burger King, NESCAFE, Careem, LEXUS, Amadeus, Panda, FAW, Intel and more.

If you need someone to come up with fresh ideas, new approaches, and look for measurable results, not afraid to fail but most eager to improve and inspire. Message me.

projects.title: 10,000 Scholarships
projects.description:
SPARK joined forces with Education Above All Foundation to celebrate 10,000 scholarships awarded to refugees, IDPs and youth from host communities since 2016.

The event had Her Majesty Queen Máxima of The Netherlands. Her Highness, Sheikha Moza bint Nasser of Qatar, spoke with several Syrian students during the virtual celebration across social media, where I had the pleasure of planning, executing, and managing the whole campaign on June 2021.

profile_positions.description:
• Developed the business unit's paid social strategy, including funnel structure and customer acquisition & retention journey.
• Managed the global PPC campaigns via external agencies and implementation of paid social campaigns by internal MarCom teams.
• Co-established and maintained scalable processes to support internal marketing teams with best practices in social management and paid campaigns.
• Acted as the point of contact to discuss technical implementation of marketing tech stack where needed to implement paid campaigns, i.e. Adobe implementation, Sprinklr integrations.
• Worked with the data & analytics team to ensure the measurement and optimisation of paid campaigns using vendor-specific dashboards, Adobe Analytics, and landing page source reports.
• Developed and automated paid and organic social reports for internal use.
• Liaised incoming projects and developments with cross-functional stakeholders.

Tools:
Sprinklr, Twitter Ads Manager, Facebook Business Manager, LinkedIn Ads Manager, Google ads manager, Adobe Analytics, Confluence, Jira, Miro, Tableau.
profile_positions.title: Paid Advertising and Social Media Specialist

profile_positions.description:
• Developed the global social media strategy of SPARK and maintained the implementation on regional accounts.
• Ran and optimised paid social campaigns, including campaign strategy and tactical execution per region.
• Developed and maintained the content and design creation processes with the regional teams to serve active social channels in the Middle East, Europe, and Eastern sub-Saharan Africa. 
• Established SPARK's social media presence in new countries like (Rwanda and South Sudan).
• Managed the regional paid campaigns via external agencies, including briefing, communication and performance monitoring.
Created and automated the paid social, organic social and website performance analysis reports.
Supported internal teams with custom training on paid ads and social media. 

Tools:
SproutSocial, Facebook Business Manager, Twitter Ads Manager, LinkedIn Ads Manager, Google Ad Manager, Google Analytics, Restream, Mailchimp, WordPress.
profile_positions.title: Global Social Media & Paid Ads Officer

profile_positions.description:
• Worked with companies to develop and execute paid social campaigns in multiple regions. 
• Managed paid social lead generation, engagement and retention strategies. 
• Defined and measured the relevant paid social KPIs.
• setting up and configuring event tracking.
• Overseeing media plans and paid social budget >€1M.
• Writing and Proofreading: Bespoke written content for corporate social platforms, digital campaigns, blogs, news features or opinion pieces related to the digital and social media industry.

Tools:
Sprinklr, Facebook business manager, Twitter Ads Manager, Snapchat Business Manager, Qlik, segment, funnel.io, mixpanel, Google Analytics.
profile_positions.title: Social Advertising Consultant

profile_positions.description:
• Developed the company's social media strategies and proposals.  
• Re-formed the brainstorming sessions with the creative team. 
• Managed the workflow within the creative team. 
• Aligned the daily tasks with the performance, commercial and marketing teams. 
• Set-up social and display ad campaigns.
• Optimizing campaigns and measuring results.
• Built all the social media & community moderation relevant reports.
• Led the creative team's communication online and offline with clients.
• Oversaw community moderation on a daily basis measured with SLAs.
• Optimized content research and creation for all clients' social networks.
• Developed + implemented multiple social campaigns from ideation to cross-channel execution and reporting.
• Led resource management over the team.
• Participated in the process of developing the team's technical performance and skills on a monthly/quarterly plan.
• Coordinated external projects with freelancers and marketing influencers.

Other Achievements:
• Helped in increasing the social proposals' technical acceptance rate to 90% in under 8 months.
• Increased the impressions rate on clients' Facebook pages to +130%, and Engagement to +60% organic.

Tools:
• Hootsuite, Buffer, Socialbakers, Iconosquare, Keyhole, Mention, Google Alerts, Buzzsumo, Google Analytics.
profile_positions.title: Social Media Manager

profile_positions.description:
• Led the social & digital team across the MENA region. 
• Set the social and digital strategy for DUGOUT MENA platforms, especially during the world cup 2018.
• Optimized + implemented the monthly editorial calendar synced with the global team. 
• Set-up social and display ad campaigns.
• Optimizing campaigns and measuring results.
• Produced + implemented social competitions and campaigns with partner-clubs like Barcelona, Real Madrid, Inter, PSG, Liverpool, Man City and Juventus. 
• Worked with the regional and global content teams to provide MENA audience with instant access to exclusive backstage video content from partner clubs.
• Worked with each partner club's digital media editor to produce and upload creative and live content made by the players themselves to use on social networks like Mbappé, CR7, Elneny and Asamoah.
• participated in increasing the video views on dugout.com to 5M in under 6 months.
• Increased Twitter Followers from 0 to +15K, Engagements +100K, organic in under 6 months. 
• Increased Facebook Fans from 0 to 5.5K organic in under 6 months. 
• Developed content look & feel that got engaged by top football players like Michael Ballack, Miralem Pjanić, Vinicius Jr, Del Piero, Elhadary, Mido and Abu Treka.

Other achievements:
• Set the social strategy for an Irish sister company operating in MENA named ALTV (Entertaining Video Content Platform).
• Developed the monthly editorial calendars.
• Coordinated the workflow between social media and community teams to organize the content produced and published for influencers and weekly shows. 
• Established ALTV Crew channel on Facebook to host talents in various categories like Football, Cinema, Travel, Cooking to start their shows broadcasted from ALTV studio. 
• Increased ALTV Crew Facebook fans from 0 to +4K organic in under 5 months.

Tools:
• Social Studio, Hootsuite, Socialbakers, Iconosquare, Buzzsumo, Facebook Pages Insights, Facebook Business Manager, Twitter Account Insights.
profile_positions.title: Regional Social Media & Paid Ads Manager

profile_positions.description:
• Strategized, defined and executed customers' social media plans. Including number and type of posts, frequency, creative ideas, and channels’ progress.
• Performed research on current benchmark trends and audience preferences.
• Assessed quarterly social media trends - making and acting upon recommendations to leverage learning.
• Worked with Account Managers to create a social media strategy that collaborates with marketing, PR and advertising campaigns, researched top influencers, competitors, and trends in clients' industries.
• Analyzed and reported social media actions on a monthly basis for successes and new opportunities.
• Implemented Social Media SEO tactics aligned with our clients’ keyword and SEO strategies.
• Built and developed the department’s plans and the proposal sent to the clients.
• Suggested and implemented new features to develop brand awareness, like promotions and competitions.

Tools:
• Hootsuite, SproutSocial, Socialbakers, Iconosquare, Klear, Google Trends, Buzzsumo, Facebook Business Manager, Twitter Ad Manager, Meltwater, Synthesio, Crimson Hexagon, Brand24, Quintly.

• Held continuous workshops for the team to elevate the performance.
• Created and supervised the creative content for all clients.
• Built and developed the social media plans and proposals sent to the clients.
• Assisted in all brands related campaigns for clients.
